targetJob: Describe your ideal job. Example: 'I want to work as a full-time software developer, specializing in backend development with Python. I'm particularly interested in AI and machine learning projects.'

personalInfo.name: Your Full Name
personalInfo.tagline: A brief professional headline describing you. Example: 'Full Stack Developer | AI Enthusiast | Problem Solver'
personalInfo.phone: Your phone number with country code, e.g. (+1)555-0123

summary: A detailed professional summary (2-4 paragraphs) highlighting your expertise, achievements, and career goals. Write this in the language you prefer for your job search.

experience.title: Your Job Title
experience.duration: Start Date - End Date (format: month year - month year)

projects.name: Project Name
details: Specific achievement or responsibility with quantifiable results

projects.name: Personal/Professional Project Name
projects.duration: Time Period (format: month year - month year)
projects.description: Brief description of the project, technologies used, and outcomes

hobbies: Group your hobbies by category. Example: 'Sports: running, swimming'

jobPreferences.location: Preferred work location and/or remote work preferences
